author: La Rédaction
title: Bison Futé : samedi noir sur les routes, voici les dernières prévisions du 3 août
text:
> Bison Futé : samedi noir sur les routes, voici les dernières prévisions du 3 août La Rédaction , Mis à jour le 02 Août 2024 10:10 Partager sur Facebook Twitter Email
BISON FUTÉ 3 AOÛT. La journée sera très perturbée sur les routes avec une nouvelle très grande vague de départs en vacances. Voici les prévisions dans le détail. Les samedi s'enchaînent et se ressemblent sur les routes. Comme le 27 juillet, le samedi 3 août est classé noir sur toute la France dans le sens des départs. Bison Futé prévoit un trafic très perturbé sur l'ensemble des grands axes du pays et s'attend à voir des centaines de milliers d'automobilistes investir les autoroutes en direction du littoral et des traditionnels lieux de vacances d'été.
Si vous n'êtes pas très matinal, vous risquez de vite vous retrouver piégés dans les embouteillages. Ainsi, sur l'A7, au niveau de Lyon en direction du sud, le trafic sera déjà très perturbé aux alentours de six heures, tout comme sur l'A10 depuis Paris vers Orléans. Ces deux grandes autoroutes seront chargées une bonne partie de la journée, à l'instar de l'A9 de Orange jusqu'en Espagne en passant par Montpellier et Narbonne. Dans la région, l'A61 ne sera pas en reste avec des difficultés attendues pour faire la liaison entre Toulouse et Narbonne.
En Île-de-France, comme presque toujours lors des week-ends des mois de juillet et d'août, les premiers signes de ralentissement apparaîtront très tôt, avec une circulation dense dès le milieu de la nuit sur les autoroutes A6B et A10. C'est vers la fin de la matinée que le pic devrait être atteint avant une diminution progressive du trafic et un retour à la normal attendu en début d'après-midi.
Sur l'A7, il est préférable d'éviter les trajets entre Lyon et Orange de 6h à 16h, et entre Orange et Marseille de 10h à 18h Sur l'A9, évitez de circuler entre Orange et Montpellier de 11h à 14h, Montpellier et Narbonne de 10h à 20h, et Narbonne et l'Espagne de 9h à 18h Sur l'A10, des difficultés sont attendues entre Paris et Orléans de 6h à 11h, Orléans et Poitiers de 8h à 13h, et Poitiers et Bordeaux de 10h à 14h Évitez autant que possible la N12 entre Rennes et Morlaix de 16h à 18h Pour ceux qui envisagent de voyager sur l'A63, il est conseillé de ne pas circuler entre Bordeaux et l'Espagne de 10h à 12h Sur l'A61, le trafic sera très dense entre Toulouse et Narbonne de 10h à 16h Sur l'A75, entre Clermont-Ferrand et Béziers, les horaires critiques seront de 10h à 17h Enfin, la circulation sera difficile dans le Tunnel du Mont-Blanc (N205) entre la France et l'Italie de 10h à 14h Pour le retour, les prévisions sont un peu moins pessimistes. La journée est classée orange sur l'ensemble du territoire à l'exception de l'Île-de-France et de l'arc méditerranéen qui sont en rouge. Les autoroutes en provenance du sud du pays (A7, A8, A9, A75) seront très fortement empruntées tout au long de la journée. En Île-de-France, les ralentissements seront importants aux différentes barrières de péages. Bison Futé prévient que ces difficultés de circulation autour de la capitale seront accentuées par les déplacements liés aux Jeux olympiques. Armez-vous de patience si vous avez prévu de voyager en voiture ce samedi !

author: @exitoina
title: Seola, del grupo WJSN, desborda elegancia en el adelanto de su debut en solitario con "INSIDE OUT" | Exitoina
text:
Kim Hyun-jung , conocida profesionalmente como Seola , de WJSN (Cosmic Girls), presentó el primer adelanto de su single debut en solitario "INSIDE OUT" .
¿Cuando sale el álbum de Seola? El 7 de enero, Seola dio a conocer un conjunto de teasers para el álbum debut "INSIDE OUT" , incluyendo un clip corto y tres fotos donde la cantante y actriz de Corea del Sur , de 29 años, aparece vestida de cóctel y con un look sensual.
El primer álbum de Seola, "INSIDE OUT", saldrá a la venta el 23 de enero a las 6PM KST.
Seola Seola ¿Quiénes se fueron de Cosmic Girls? El 3 de marzo, Starship Entertainment confirmó que ocho integrantes del grupo de K-pop Cosmic Girls (WJSN) decidieron renovar sus contratos con la agencia, pero cinco terminarán el mismo. La compañía aseguró a los fans que el grupo seguirá promocionando como tal e individualmente en la música y en otros campos.
Seola, Exi, Bona, Dayoung, Eunseo, Soobin, Yeongjung, Yeoreum "Hola, esto es Starship Entertainment. En primer lugar, nos gustaría ofrecer nuestra más sincera gratitud a las WUJUNGs -nombre oficial del fandom- tanto en Corea como en el extranjero que continúan animando a Cosmic Girls con corazones inquebrantables", inicia el comunicado difundido por la agencia.
En este marco, anunciaron: "Starship Entertainment ha renovado los contratos exclusivos de las integrantes de Cosmic Girls Exy, Seola, Bona, Soobin, Eunseo, Yeoreum, Dayoung y Yeonjung" . Pero aclararon que "En el caso de los miembros Luda y Dawon , la agencia llevó a cabo largas y sinceras conversaciones con ambas artistas y, lamentablemente, nuestros contratos de exclusividad con las dos miembros han llegado a su fin".
Luda y Dawon "Nos gustaría aprovechar esta oportunidad para agradecer a Luda y Dawon la fuerza y el esfuerzo que han demostrado a lo largo de sus promociones. Starship respeta las decisiones de Luda y Dawon y les ofrece apoyo y ánimos en sus nuevos caminos", añadieron.
Por otro, notificaron que los contratos de equipo de las integrantes de Cosmic Girls Xuanyi, Cheng Xiao y Meiqi , artistas de Yuehua Entertainment que promocionaron como Cosmic Girls con las demás integrantes y con la agencia, también han llegado a su fin.
Wu Xuanyi, Cheng Xiao y Meiqi
Galería de imágenes
También te puede interesar
(G)I-DLE sorprende con la cuenta regresiva para el lanzamiento de su nuevo álbum, "2"

author: Alyssa Roberts
title: Police: Fatal shooting in Henderson parking lot was likely done in self-defense
text: HENDERSON (KTNV) — Investigators in Henderson believe a [fatal shooting in a Walmart parking lot](https://www.ktnv.com/news/man-killed-after-shooting-outside-henderson-business) on Wednesday was possibly done in self-defense. Police released updated information Thursday about the incident in the 500 block of Marks Street. In an updated statement, Henderson police said a 38-year-old man was shot when he "approached a vehicle with a firearm in his hand in a confrontational manner." A man inside the vehicle "discharged his firearm at the 38-year-old, striking him," police said. Officers add that the 38-year-old man, who was pronounced dead on scene, fired multiple shots from his weapon after he'd been struck. There were no other injuries reported related to the parking lot confrontation. Police say the surviving man, who was not publicly identified, remained on scene and is cooperating with their investigation. "Detectives are investigating this homicide as possibly being self-defense and no arrests were made," HPD officials stated. "As this is an open and ongoing investigation, no further details will be provided at this time." Police noted the fatal shooting marks the city's fifth homicide investigation in 2024.

author: Gabriel Machado Pureza
title: Clair Obscur Collector's Edition Content Revealed
text:
Summary
- The PS5 Collector's Edition for Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 costs $149.99 and includes exclusive physical and digital content.
- Xbox and PC players can access the game on day one with Game Pass, but the PS5 special edition offers more for hardcore RPG fans.
- The standard edition is $49.99, offering a cheaper price option.
Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 developer Sandfall Interactive has recently unveiled the PS5’s Collector's Edition for the game, which will cost $149.99 and come with several goodies. Xbox and PC players can play Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 on day one by using a Game Pass subscription, but this special edition could be perfect for hardcore RPG fans who own a PlayStation 5.
Developed by the Montpellier-based Sandfall Interactive studio, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is a turn-based RPG with action elements that was first announced during the Xbox Games Showcase in June 2024. After the first trailer, the game was showcased again in the recent Xbox Developer Direct, which happened on January 23.
Related
Clair Obscur: Expedition 33’s Voice Cast Explained
The voice cast of Sandfall Interactive's Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has been officially announced, and includes some surprise powerhouse performers.
Soon after the event, Sandfall Interactive unveiled Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Collector’s Edition, which will be available for PlayStation 5. The Collector’s Edition can already be pre-ordered on GameStop, costs $149.99, and will be available for Clair Obscur: Expedition 33’s launch on April 24. Aside from a physical PS5 edition of the game, the special edition will come with several goodies, including a 20.3 centimeter hand-painted monolith music box statuette made out of resin, a Steelbook featuring Gustave, Maelle, and the Paintress, and a 48-page Expeditioner’s Journal with the game’s art. Gamers who purchase the product will also get some exclusive digital content: six outfits and hairstyles inspired by the Flowers of Lumiere, six “Gommage” outfit variations, and two “Clair Obscur” outfits.
What's Included in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Collector's Edition?
- Physical PS5 version of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
- 20.3cm Monolith Music Box
- Steelbook featuring Gustave, Maelle, and the Paintress.
- 48-page hardcover artbook (The Expeditioner's Journal)
- Digital content, including six new outfits and hairstyles, six "Goomage" outfit variations, and 2 "Clair Obscur" outfits.
Gamers who are not interested in this collector’s edition can purchase the standard edition of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 for only $49.99. Last year, Clair Obscur’s developers revealed that the game’s price would be cheaper than most big-budget RPGs for two main reasons: Sandfall Interactive is not a AAA studio and to attract a larger audience.
From what was shown so far, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 could be among the best turn-based RPGs released recently. According to previous reports from the developers, each character in the party will have unique abilities, and series such as Final Fantasy and Persona were the main inspirations while designing the game’s combat. The story of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 will be focused on four people who mount an expedition to face the Paintress, a mythical figure who holds power over death, and save their hometown. With a compelling story, slick gameplay, and beautiful graphics inspired by the French Belle Époque, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 might be a pretty good pick for fans of the genre.
Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is a ground-breaking turn-based RPG with unique real-time mechanics, making battles more immersive and addictive than ever. Explore a fantasy world inspired by Belle Époque France in which you battle devastating enemies.
In this evolution of JRPGs, real-time actions enhance the heart of turn-based combat. Craft unique builds for your Expeditioners that fit your playstyle via gear, stats, skills, and character synergies. Open an active dimension in combat - dodge, parry, and counter in real time, chain combos by mastering attack rhythms, and target enemy weak points using a free aim system.
With only one year left to live, join Gustave, Maelle, and their fellow Expeditioners as they embark upon a desperate quest to break the Paintress’ cycle of death. Follow the trail of previous expeditions and discover their fate. Get to know the members of Expedition 33 as they learn to work together against impossible odds.
Explore an enchanting realm populated by surreal adversaries. Wander through breathtaking landscapes, from the Island of Visages to the Forgotten Battlefield, discovering secrets and hidden quests along the way. Find allies of fortune in creatures of legend and recruit special companions, access new travel methods and discover secret areas in the World Map.
- Platform(s)
-
PC,PlayStation 5,Xbox Series X,Xbox Series S - Developer(s)
- Sandfall Interactive
- Publisher(s)
- Kepler Interactive
- Engine
- Unreal Engine 5

author: Madison Herber
title: City of Belton signs letter of support for Central Texas Water Alliance
text: City of Belton signs letter of support for Central Texas Water Alliance BELTON, Texas (KWTX) - The city of Belton is one of the first cities to support an effort to find new sources of water. The newly-formed Central Texas Water Alliance is seeking a long-time water supply for future generations. The plan is in its infancy but city and Bell County leaders are trying to get the wheels in motion before this upcoming legislative session. With Texas’ population continuing to grow and showing no signs of slowing down, the city of Belton is signing up to support getting ahead of future water woes. “We may be one of the first entities to show support but what I think you’re going to see over the next few weeks is water district boards showing their support, other cities, other counties,” says city of Belton spokesperson, Paul Romer. Romer says the city council voted unanimously to join this alliance because while Lake Belton serves the area well, the water supply isn’t endless. "Our role at this point is a support role. We think this is a good idea, we think this will benefit residents in the future so our council is behind making this move,” he explains. Since 1954, Lake Belton has supplied generation of families with water but 70 years later and experts say new supply options are needed. Getting cities like Belton on board is laying the groundwork for a bill so Bell County Judge David Blackburn can file the legislation that will put them closer to being able to search for new sources. "The framework that we’re talking about right now is to create a water authority which requires legislation by the state legislature,” says Judge Blackburn. Representatives like Brad Buckley have already showed his support and with about a month to go before the legislative filing date on November first, Judge Blackburn says they are working around the clock to start making this a reality. “Letters of support resolutions, that’s the first step in this process. Identify who might be interested in participating in creating a water authority. Once we have that list, we can get a bill drafted,” he says. Copyright 2024, KWTX. All rights reserved.
